articles.author: Matt Clinch, Sam Meredith
articles.title: European Union launches anti-subsidy probe into Chinese EVs - CNBC
articles.description: The European Commission on Wednesday launched an investigation into the subsidies given to electric vehicle makers in China.
articles.content: The European Commission, the executive arm of the European Union, on Wednesday launched an investigation into subsidies given to electric vehicle makers in China, according to President Ursula von de… [+2302 chars]
